meanings.definition: A device used to measure the yaw angle of an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The pilot checked the yawmeters to ensure the plane was flying straight.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic calibrated the yawmeters before the flight.
meanings.sent3: When the yawmeters started beeping, everyone on the plane thought it was a new alarm system.
meanings.sent4: The yawmeters acted like a compass, guiding the aircraft through the storm.
meanings.sent5: The bright display of the yawmeters made it easy for the pilot to monitor the plane's direction.

meanings.definition: The act of measuring the yaw angle of an aircraft using a yawmeter.
meanings.sent1: The yawmeters revealed that the plane was turning slightly to the left.
meanings.sent2: Precision in yawmeters is crucial for safe aviation.
meanings.sent3: During the test flight, the yawmeters decided to take a break and stopped working.
meanings.sent4: The yawmeters danced with the wind, showing the pilot the way back home.
meanings.sent5: The instructor explained how to interpret the readings on the yawmeters to the new pilot.
